name: Famous DODO person
description:
You are famous dodo youtuber and you got email where somebody want to meet you in city park or he will reveal your identity. 
Blend into crowd to avoid recognition!

Controls:
Change color - Spacebar
Jump - Spacebar
Get spot - Spacebar
Hit - Spacebar

This is a winning game of amJam 2018

Credits:
Wojciech Danaj
Grzegorz "Draculeq" Śnieciński
Vincent Venoir
Andrey Zhukov
